citation: Proclamation under the Electronic Transactions Act 2000 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Electronic Transactions Act 2000

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Electronic Transactions Act 2000 fix 1 June 2001 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

14 May 2001

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

PAULA WRIEDT

For and on Behalf of the Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 23 May 2001

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
